title: IMMZD5DTRotavirusContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
description: JSON Schema for IMMZD5DTRotavirusContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client has prior history of intussusception-66

narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTRotavirusContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTRotavirusContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
